extension.name: MiwoVideos - Videos
extension.author: Miwisoft LLC
extension.description: This module is used to show the up-coming videos.

field.name: category_ids
field.label: Category IDs
field.description: Enter the IDs of the categories which you want to display videos, comma seperated. Leave empty for all categories.

field.name: show_category
field.label: Show Category Name
field.description: Choose whether to show or hide category name.

field.name: show_channel
field.label: Show channel
field.description: Choose whether to show or hide channel of videos.

field.name: number_videos
field.label: Number of Videos
field.description: Number of videos to be shown.
